trans-unit.source: Defines <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> criteria to select part-level or package-level relationships.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i criteri <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> per selezionare tra relazioni a livello di parte o a livello di package.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> method of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> class to specify a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts to be signed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> viene utilizzato il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> metodo il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> classe per specificare un elenco di <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parti da firmare.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A> property of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> class to obtain a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts that have been signed with the given digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> viene utilizzato il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> classe per ottenere un elenco di <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parti che sono state firmate con la firma digitale specificata.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> or the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> (<c>SourceUri</c>="/") that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> o dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> (<c>SourceUri</c>="/") proprietari della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <c>selectionCriteria</c>, either by relationship <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or relationship <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Tipo dell'oggetto <c>selectionCriteria</c>, tramite relazione <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> o tramite relazione <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" />.

trans-unit.source: The qualification string that is used to select the relationships based on the <c>selectorType</c>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa di qualificazione usata per selezionare le relazioni basate sull'oggetto <c>selectorType</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceUri" /> or <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceUri" /> o <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectorType" /> parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="selectorType" /> non è valido.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectorType" /> parameter is <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> but <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/includes/tlasharptla-xsd-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="selectorType" /> è <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> ma <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> non è un oggetto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/includes/tlasharptla-xsd-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] valido.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceUri" /> is not the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> root ("/") and is also not a valid <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceUri" /> non è la radice di <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> ("/") e non è un oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] valido.

trans-unit.source: The package from which to select the relationships based on the selection criteria.
trans-unit.target: Il package dal quale selezionare le relazioni basate sui criteri di selezione.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> objects that match the defined <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri" />, <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" />, and <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un elenco di oggetti <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> che corrispondono agli oggetti <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri" />, <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" />e <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria" /> definiti.

trans-unit.source: A list of relationships that match the selection parameters specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco di relazioni che corrispondono ai parametri di selezione specificati al costruttore <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the selection criteria specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i criteri di selezione specificati al costruttore <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: The selection criteria based on the <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" /> of <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: I criteri di selezione basati sull'oggetto <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> o dell'oggetto <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> specificati al costruttore <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType" /> specificato al costruttore <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: The selector type of <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di selettore dell'oggetto <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> o dell'oggetto <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> specificati per il costruttore <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root package URI ("/") or part <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l' URI ("/") del package radice o la parte <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> specificati al costruttore <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> come proprietario della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The root package URI ("/") or part <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: URI ("/") del package radice o la parte <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> specificati al costruttore <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> come proprietario della relazione.
